modules.name: Elastika
modules.description: Filters audio through a simulated network of balls and springs.

modules.name: Frolic
modules.description: Chaotic oscillator based on the Rucklidge Attractor.

modules.name: Glee
modules.description: Chaotic oscillator based on the Aizawa Attractor.

modules.name: Hiss
modules.description: Generates directionally unbiased N-dimensional vector noise.

modules.name: Nucleus
modules.description: Simulation of a cloud of particles with mutually attractive, repulsive, and orthogonal forces.

modules.name: Polynucleus
modules.description: Simulation of a cloud of particles with mutually attractive, repulsive, and orthogonal forces.

modules.name: Tin
modules.description: Feeds arbitrary input signals into Tricorder.

modules.name: Tout
modules.description: Receives vectors from the left just like Tricorder does, then outputs them to ports.

modules.name: Tricorder
modules.description: 3D plotter expander module for Frolic and Tin.
